documentation.text: @dev Interface for the transferable functions from the ERC3664.
@dev Emitted when  attribute type `attrId` are approved to "to" from `from` by `operator`.
@dev Returns true if `attrId` is approved to token `to` from token `from`.

@dev Approve attribute type `attrId` of token `from` to token `to` called by `from` holder.
 Emits an {AttributeApproval} event.

@dev Transfers attribute type `attrId` from token type `from` to `to`.
 Emits a {TransferSingle} event.
@dev Interface for the transferable functions from the ERC3664.
@dev Emitted when  attribute type `attrId` are approved to "to" from `from` by `operator`.
@dev Returns true if `attrId` is approved to token `to` from token `from`.

@dev Approve attribute type `attrId` of token `from` to token `to` called by `from` holder.
 Emits an {AttributeApproval} event.

@dev Transfers attribute type `attrId` from token type `from` to `to`.
 Emits a {TransferSingle} event.

devdoc.details: Interface for the transferable functions from the ERC3664.

AttributeApproval(address,uint256,uint25.details: Emitted when  attribute type `attrId` are approved to "to" from `from` by `operator`.

approve(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Approve attribute type `attrId` of token `from` to token `to` called by `from` holder. Emits an {AttributeApproval} event.

attach(uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes,boo.details: Attaches `amount` value of attribute type `attrId` to `tokenId`.

attrURI(uint256).details: Returns the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for `attrId` attribute.

attributesOf(uint256).details: Returns all attribute types of owned by `tokenId`.

balanceOf(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the attribute type `attrId` value owned by `tokenId`.

balanceOfBatch(uint256,uint256[]).details: Returns the batch of attribute type `attrIds` values owned by `tokenId`.

isApproved(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Returns true if `attrId` is approved to token `to` from token `from`.

name(uint256).details: Returns the name of the attribute.

primaryAttributeOf(uint256).details: Returns primary attribute type of owned by `tokenId`.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

symbol(uint256).details: Returns the symbol of the attribute.

transferFrom(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Transfers attribute type `attrId` from token type `from` to `to`. Emits a {TransferSingle} event.
